Description: Very RARE 1959 Kay Sizzler K4144 Dual Pickup Set-neck electric guitar == All original Excellent condition with light wear -- some edge wear, one black fret dot missing, a bit of wear to fretboard -- Straight Neck with very light fret wear == Stackpole pots date 1957 and 1958 (304744 and 304848) == Quite rare, this model was only available one year! == "Dramatic Black and White" is what the 1959 Kay catalog says about the finish, it's black & white textured == Electronics working properly, pots sprayed, fresh 9-42 strings == Includes original two-tone case == NO ROSEWOOD We Ship Worldwide!
